name: Hibari
text: On Play: Give up to 1 of your opponents Characters -2000 power during this turn. When Attacking: This Character gains +1000 power during this turn. Then, if your Leader has the (Navy) type, up to 1 of your Leaders may attack active Characters during this turn.
